fields.description: I, the undersigned, acknowledge that the use of rental equipment/services provided by [Your Business Name] involves inherent risks, including but not limited to personal injury, property damage, and financial loss. I voluntarily assume all associated risks and agree to release [Your Business Name], its owners, employees, and affiliates from any claims or liabilities arising from my participation. I agree to use the equipment responsibly and accept full financial responsibility for any damage, loss, or theft during the rental period.

rules.value: I have read and agree to the terms of the Liability Waiver.
